Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 manupuththirane, Nee Theerkkadharisanam Sollu: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Aiyo! Aabaththunaal Varugiradhendru Alarungal.
3 naal Sameebamaayirukkiradhu; Aam, Karththarudaiya Naal Sameebamaayirukkiradhu; Adhu Mandhaaramaana Naal, Adhu Purajaadhigalukku Varum Kaalam.

4 pattayam Egipthile Varum; Egipthile Kolaiyungiravargal Vizhumpodhu Eththiyoppiyaavile Magaa Vedhanai Undaayirukkum; Adhin Eraalamaana Janaththaip Pidiththukkondupovaargal; Adhin Asthibaarangal Nirmoolamaakkappadum.
5 eththiyoppiyarum, Pooththiyarum, Looththiyarum, Kalandha Koottamaagiya Anaivarum, Koobiyarum, Udanpadikkaikkullaana Dhesaththin Puththirarum Avargalodekoodap Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal.

6 egipthai Aadharikkiravargalum Vizhuvaargal; Adhinudaiya Balaththin Mukkiyamum Thaazhndhupom Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Adhile Migadholmudhal Sevenevaraikkum Pattayaththinaal Vizhuvaargalendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
7 paazhaaippona Dhesangalin Naduvile Paazhaaippovaargal; Avaandharamaakkappatta Pattanangalil Avargal Pattanangalum Avaandharamaagum.
8 naan Egipthile Theekkoluththumpodhum, Unakkuth Thunainindra Yaavarum Murikkappadumpodhum, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.

9 nirvisaaramaana Eththiyoppiyaraith Thaththalikkappanna Annaalile En Kattalaiyinaal Thoodhaatkal Kappalgalile Povaargal; Appozhudhu Egipthin Naalile Undaanadhupola Avargalukkulle Magaa Vedhanai Undaayirukkum; Idho, Adhu Varugiradhu.
10 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaaraikkondu Egipthin Sandhadhiyai Ozhiyappannuven.

11 ivanum Ivanodekooda Jaadhigalil Magaa Balasaaligalaana Ivanudaiya Janangalum Dhesaththai Azhippadharkaaga Evappattu Vandhu, Thangal Pattayangalai Egipthukku Virodhamaaga Uruvi, Kolaiyundavargalaale Dhesaththai Nirappuvaargal.

12 appozhudhu Naan Nadhigalai Vatrippogappanni, Dhesaththai Dhushtargalin Kaiyile Vitru, Dhesaththaiyum Adhilulla Yaavaiyum Anniyadhesaththaarin Kaiyaal Paazhaakkippoduven; Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen.

13 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Naan Naragalaana Vikkiragangalai Azhiththu, Noppin Silaigalai Ozhiyappannuven; Ini Egipthudhesaththil Oru Adhipadhiyumiraan; Naan Egipthudhesaththil Bayamundaakki,
14 padhrosaip Paazhaakki Sovaanile Theekkoluththi, No Pattanaththil Aakkinaigalai Seydhu,
15 egipthin Belanaagiya Seeninmel En Ukkiraththai Ootri, Nopattanaththin Eraalamaana Janaththai Sangarippen.
16 egipthil Theekkoluththuven; Seen Magaa Vedhanai Adaiyum; No Pattanam Thagarndhu Idindhupogum; Noppukku Dhinandhorum Nerukkangalundaagum.
17 aaven, Pibesedh Engira Pattanangalin Velaikkaarar Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal; Avaigalin Kudigal Siraiyiruppukkup Povaargal.
18 egipthin Nugangalai Naan Murikkumpodhum, Adhinudaiya Belaththin Mukkiyam Adhile Oyumpodhum, Mandhaaram Adhai Moodum; Thakpaanesile Pagal Irundupogum; Adhin Kumaaraththigal Siraippattuppovaargal.
19 ippadi Egipthile Nyaayaththeerppugalai Seyven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal Engiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
20 padhinoraam Varusham Mudhalaam Maadham Ezhaanthedhiyile, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

21 manupuththirane, Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonudaiya Buyaththai Muriththuppoduven; Idho, Adhu Gunamaakkaththakkadhaagak Kattappaduvadhillai; Adhu Pattayaththaip Pidikkaththakka Belanai Adaiyumpadi Paththaivaiththuk Kattappaduvadhumillai.

22 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Idho, Naan Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonukku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Belanulladhum Murindhadhumaagiya Avanudaiya Buyangalai Muriththuppoduven; Pattayaththai Naan Avan Kaiyilirundhu Vizhappanni,
23 egipthiyarai Jaadhigalukkulle Sidharadiththu, Avargalai Dhesangalil Thootrividuven.

24 baabilon Raajaavin Buyangalai Belappaduththi, Avan Kaiyile En Pattayaththaik Koduththu, Paarvonin Buyangalai Muriththuviduven; Appozhudhu Avan Kolaiyungiravan Thavikkiradhupola Avanukku Munbaagath Thavippaan.

25 baabilon Raajaavin Buyangalai Belappaduththuven; Paarvonin Buyangalo Vizhundhupom; En Pattayaththai Naan Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyil Kodukkumpodhum, Avan Adhai Egipthudhesaththinmel Neettumpodhum, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.
26 naan Egipthiyarai Jaadhigalukkulle Sidharadiththu, Avargalai Dhesangalil Thootrippoduven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.
